## saturate() function

Increases the saturation of a color.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function saturate(rgb: RGB, amount: number): RGB;
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

RGB color to transform


</td></tr>

amount


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

Amount to increase saturation (-1.0 to +1.0)


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[RGB](./chromaterm.rgb.md)

New RGB color with adjusted saturation
